ParameterFields.Name: Number of Gyorgs
ParameterFields.ToolTip: How many Gyorgs to spawn. 15 defaults to 1 Gyorg.

ParameterFields.Name: Sight Range (Thousands)
ParameterFields.ToolTip: This number multiplied by 1000 is the range it can see KoRL within and will start spawning Gyorgs.

ParameterFields.Name: Enable Spawn Switch
ParameterFields.ToolTip: If this switch is valid, the spawner will not start spawning Gyorgs until the switch is set.
